EDITING DELEGATE: webViewDidChangeSelection:WebViewDidChangeSelectionNotification
EDITING DELEGATE: webViewDidChangeSelection:WebViewDidChangeSelectionNotification
EDITING DELEGATE: webViewDidChangeSelection:WebViewDidChangeSelectionNotification
EDITING DELEGATE: webViewDidChange:WebViewDidChangeNotification
EDITING DELEGATE: webViewDidChangeSelection:WebViewDidChangeSelectionNotification
EDITING DELEGATE: webViewDidChange:WebViewDidChangeNotification

You should see aax\tz below:
| "
"
| <span>
|   id="test"
|   "aax<#selection-caret>"
|   <span>
|     style="white-space:pre"
|     "			"
|   "z"
| "
"
